item.title: Blog Post 1
item.description: The best decison I could have made One of the most common questions children are asked is ‘What do you want to be when you are older?’. In my opinion this is quite a difficult question to answer. Not many people have a firm idea of what they really want to do. There are of course those who know exactly which career direction they wish to pursue, medicine for example. However, for most of us, finding that one thing that is going to spark your interest and kickstart your career is quite hard to discover.
